abstract: Goldman Sachs has hired the former New York Times reporter Stephen Labaton as a full-time consultant on regulatory and legal issues, Politico reported.
snippet: Goldman Sachs has hired the former New York Times reporter Stephen Labaton as a full-time consultant on regulatory and legal issues, Politico reported.
lead_paragraph: Goldman Sachs has hired the former New York Times reporter Stephen Labaton as a full-time consultant on regulatory and legal issues, Politico reported.

headline.main: Goldman Said to Hire Former Times Reporter
